body.p:
To His Excellency.
Thos. E Bramlette
Govr. of Kenty.
Sir.

Your petitioners would respectfully represent that at the Decem November Term of the Jefferson Circuit Court 23 indictments were found against George Harrison and 18 indictments were found against T. Featherty and 6 indictments were found against Mike Carrot They are charged with dealing cards dealing at gaming tables. They were simply the Employee of Mr. , and as there are Eighty four indictments against him it would seem to be proper to relieve them from this liability. We therefore respectfully request your Excellency to pardon the several offenses.
The statements contained in the foregoing petition are true. The petitioners are very poor men, & I respectfully Join in the prayer of the petitioners for a pardon of the offense

W. G. Reasor City atty
Geo. Stealey
Wm Hipwell
Hamilton Pope
I have read the statement of Wm G Reasor touching the foregoing petition & I Join him in that statement & request that they ^the petitioners be^ be pardoned_
I concur in the above after reading Mr Reasor's Statement
